text: Rasim Öztekin (14 January 1959 – 8 March 2021) was a Turkish actor. He appeared in more than forty movies from 1985 until his death. He was known for his roles in G.O.R.A. (2004), Pardon (2005), When Luck Breaks the Door (2005), For Love and Honor (2007), One Day in the Future (2010) and Düğün Dernek (2013). Öztekin died of a heart attack on 8 March 2021 in Istanbul at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish television actors Category:Turkish stage actors Category:Actors from Istanbul Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Rasim Öztekin
